title: About Luke Goodman, PMP
text:
Luke is a tech- and data-savvy problem solver and strategist with practical experience working with and for large tech companies such as Meta, entreprenurial start-ups, corporate banks such as Goldman Sachs, and plenty in-between. He is committed to working in and being a steward of transparent, pragmatic, and innovative team environments.
Luke is excited by a broad range of opportunities, and is passionate about delivering value-driven products and processes that emphasize safety, quality, and security to people, especially in the fields of AI and other transformative technologies. He is interested in roles in analytics and data science, product management, program management, project management, strategy, operations, or any combination of these domains.
Outside of work, Luke enjoys basketball and volleyball, reading, crossword puzzles, camping and other outdoor activities, volunteering in his community, and continued learning.
You can find Luke’s work history or contact him on LinkedIn, as well as some extended information about some of his coursework, projects, and other exploits on the Projects page of this site.
